#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);cin.tie(0);
	long long int t,i,count;
	string s;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		count=0;
		cin>>s;
		int a[30];
		for(i=0;i<30;i++)
		a[i]=0;
		for(i=0;i<s.length();i++)
		{
			if(a[(int)s[i]-96]==0)
			{
			count++;
			a[(int)s[i]-96]++;
		    }
		}
		if(count%2!=0)
		cout<<"Counter Terrorist"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"Terrorist"<<endl;
	}
}
